DESCRIPTION: Converts a real number to an integer.
EXAMPLE: <h3>Fix Example</h3> <p>Fix returns the closest integer less than the number if the number is greater than or equal to 0. Fix returns the closest integer greater than the number if number is less than 0.</p> <cfoutput> <p>The fix of 3.4 is #Fix(3.4)#</p> <p>The fix of 3 is #Fix(3)#</p> <p>The fix of 3.8 is #Fix(3.8)#</p> <p>The fix of -4.2 is #Fix(-4.2)#</p> </cfoutput>
